name: In Massilia Conseil
goal:
Provide business leaders and industry experts with reliable counsel and advice supporting their licence to operate

Act as a liaison expert between business and the EU Institutions

Guide and support business in their outreach to EU stakeholders
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Fraud prevention, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
Consumer goods (cosmetics); Public Health, Healthcare
Chemicals
Energy and sustainable development
